person.persName: John W. Pursley (Trigg County, Kentucky, resident.)

body.p: Trigg County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Son of Richard M. Pursley and Louisiana Pursley. Resident of Trigg County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned one enslaved person in Trigg County in 1850. Attended school in Trigg County in 1860. Household owned two enslaved persons in Trigg County in 1860.
